definitions.definition: the act or process of making or producing something
to make somebody become a better or more successful person

examples.text: University was the making of Joe.

definitions.definition: to have the qualities that are necessary to become something

examples.text: Her first novel has all the makings of a classic.
He has the makings of a first-rate lawyer.

definitions.definition: in the process of becoming something or of being made

examples.text: This model was two years in the making.
These events are **history in the making**.

definitions.definition: created by you rather than by somebody/something else
